text:
Piotr Müller, the spokesman of the #Polish government has confirmed December 27-28 as a realistic date to start the #COVID19 #vaccination programme depending on the delivery of the #vaccines to the country.
@PiotrMuller 
#Poland #COVID19PL #vaccine
